attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app is literally the worst one ever. It does nothing but drain your battery and keep bringing up pictures of the orange cheeto man. i got this app thinking since it was from our president that it would be good but it WAS THE COMPLETE OPPOSITE!!!!! It glitches non stop and too confusing to use, NOBODY should get this app or even support this man. DONT GET THIS APP AND DONT VOTE FOR HIM!!!

attributes.title: READ THIS!!
attributes.review: This app glitches my phone and put a bug in it I tried to restart is and it didn’t work . All my passwords got leaked and hacked  I tried to do software shutdown restart thing and it didn’t work I had to get a new phone and new logins and passwords for everything.

attributes.title: I ALMOST TURNED ORANGE
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support our orange king👑 but as soon as i downloaded it I STARTED TURNING ORANGE !!! please let me know if this happened to anyone. i really wanted to be apart of the trumpanzees(troompa loopas, trumpets) but if i have to turn orange i WILL NOT accept this. donald you racist homophobe please reconsider deleting this app instead of tiktok luv✨ anyways bye our fellow orange peel😜❤️

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE!!!😡😡
attributes.review:
All of my cats friends were all trump supporters. So he decided to become a trump supporter and download this app. The app started glitching so badly that his phone grew arms and legs. Then his phone was running around the house because his phone hates homophobic, transphobic, Islamophobic, racist, white supremacist supporters, and rapist.

My cat no longer supports trump😍 he became educated🥰

attributes.title: I am angry
attributes.review: As soon as I open the app it glitches and it shows a big fat juicy orange on my screen this game needs to be taken down immediately I AM ANGRY I thought I would get a regular Trump app but no y’all show some big fat juicy orange orange orange person. Do no download the app unless you are making a bad review for APPLE TAKE THIS DUMB STUPID APP DOWN.

attributes.title: Not a good app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for  me and my daughter and all of sudden it told me if I want to watch porn live porn so my daughter pressed it but accidentally and guess where it took us. Straight to the live I immediately took the phone and went to my room and deleted the app

attributes.title: Don’t pick trump
attributes.review: Women we need to stand together he does not support woman’s rights! LGBTQ+ we need to stand together Donald trump hates us so we need more hate from a president?! Also to my animal lovers trump made it legal to kill baby wolves and bears! And if you are all three of these things your amazing stick together we all need happiness!

attributes.title: DO NOT GET!! PLEASE READ BEFORE GETTING
attributes.review: i was trying to get this app when i realized as soon as i dowloaded all my photos were deleted and my phone glitches out, i had to spend hundreds on a new phone and will never be downloading again. please save yoir time money and your phone data ❤️

attributes.title: Highly don’t recommend
attributes.review: This app made my phone crash like 12 times. After deleting it and downloading again, the same bs information came up again! I guess my phone doesn’t like loading up pictures of this orange pumpkin spice latte lookin mf.

attributes.title: Dont press that button to download this. Its garbonzo beans.🚫🧢
attributes.review: When i seen the app i said WOWWW out President has app that’s amazing. Then I remembered that he was a homophobic, transphobic, racist who puts people on cages. Uses the army for his pleasure. Tried to get the central park 5 killed. Then he said black people dont work. ( not true✨🧚🏿‍♂️✨) so yeah this app is not it chief 🤷🏾‍♂️
